chiaroscuro.name: Chiaroscuro
chiaroscuro.description: Strong contrasts between light and dark to model form and create depth.

sfumato.name: Sfumato
sfumato.description: Soft transitions between tones and colors without harsh lines.

impasto.name: Impasto
impasto.description: Thick, textured paint application that emphasizes brushwork.

glazing.name: Glazing
glazing.description: Multiple transparent layers of paint to enrich color and luminosity.

pointillism.name: Pointillism
pointillism.description: Dots of pure color placed side by side to optically mix at a distance.

alla_prima.name: Alla Prima
alla_prima.description: Direct painting in one session without detailed underlayers.

collage.name: Collage
collage.description: Combining pasted materials (paper, fabric, photos) into the composition.

assemblage.name: Assemblage
assemblage.description: 3D collage using found objects to create mixed-media works.

frottage.name: Frottage
frottage.description: Rubbings taken from textured surfaces to generate forms.

dripping.name: Dripping
dripping.description: Pouring or dripping paint onto canvas to build rhythmic patterns.

color_field.name: Color Field
color_field.description: Large areas of flat color for immersive, meditative effects.

tenebrism.name: Tenebrism
tenebrism.description: Extreme chiaroscuro with deep shadows and spotlight-like illumination.

linear_perspective.name: Linear Perspective
linear_perspective.description: Geometric construction of space with vanishing points.

atmospheric_perspective.name: Atmospheric Perspective
atmospheric_perspective.description: Depth via color/light shifts: distant forms lighter and bluer.
